properties.maintenanceTitle: Routine Maintenance: Scheduled on Mon, 15 Jan 2024 05:00:00 GMT - Mon, 15 Jan 2024 06:00:00 GMT
properties.maintenanceDescription: Your Azure Database For MySQL routine maintenance will be performed on the scheduled maintenance window between Mon, 15 Jan 2024 05:00:00 GMT and Mon, 15 Jan 2024 06:00:00 GMT. During the maintenance window, your instance may experience temporary service interruption. Our team will minimize any impact and ensure a smooth transition
